summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Elliott Bay Parkway; authorizing execution of an agreement between the City and New England Fish Company pertaining to an easement for pedestrian and bicycle pathway and other purposes in the vicinity of New England Fish Company's property at Pier 89, and authorizing execution of a "Second Modification of Agreement" with the Port of Seattle and Burlington Northern, Inc. modifying the agreement (C.F. 263014) authorized by Ordinance 97097 as amended pursuant to Ordinance 103112.
